text: David noticed David had put on a lot of weight recently. David examined David's habits to try and figure out the reason. David realized David had been eating too much fast food lately. David stopped going to burger places and started a vegetarian diet. After a few weeks, David started to feel much better.

Tom had a very short temper. One day a guest made Tom very angry. Tom punched a hole in the wall of Tom's house. Tom's guest became afraid and left quickly. Tom sat on Tom's couch filled with regret about Tom's actions.

Marcus needed clothing for a business casual event. All of Marcus's clothes were either too formal or too casual. Marcus decided to buy a pair of khakis. The pair Marcus bought fit Marcus perfectly. Marcus was happy to have the right clothes for the event.

Bobby thought Bill should buy a trailer and haul the trailer with Bill's car. Bill thought a truck would be better for what Bill needed. Bobby pointed out two vehicles were much more expensive. Bill was set in Bill's ways with conventional thinking. Bill ended up buying the truck Bill wanted despite Bobby's advice.

John was a pastor with a very bad memory. John tried to memorize John sermons many days in advance but to no avail. John decided to learn to sing to overcome John handicap. John then made all John sermons into music and sang them on Sundays. John congregation was delighted and so was John.

Melody's parents surprised Melody with a trip to the big aquarium. Melody took a nap during the two hour car ride to the aquarium. When Melody arrived, Melody was energetic and excited. At the aquarium Melody saw sharks, tropical fish and many others. After five hours at the aquarium, Melody and Melody's family drove home.

The math teacher announced a pop quiz as class began. While some students complained, the math teacher began passing out the quiz. I took out a pencil and began to work. About 5 minutes later, I finished. I stood up feeling confident and turned the quiz in.

My first girlfriend I met on the internet. My girlfriend lives about 4 hours away from me. Finally after 2 years we met each other. My girlfriend stayed with me for a week or two. We decided we couldn't be apart so my girlfriend moved in with me.

I got Charlie Horse when I was four years old. Charlie Horse is a brown stuffed horse. At 35 I still sleep with Charlie Horse at night. Charlie Horse was my best friend and always laid at the head of my bed. I laid Charlie Horse next to me, smelling Charlie Horse's soft fur every night. I liked to listen to my radio as I fell asleep cuddling Charlie Horse.

Laura loved corn. So Laura decided to grow some in Laura's backyard. The whole process of growing them made Laura very excited. But Laura realized that corn required too much water. So Laura quickly abandoned Laura's corn garden idea.
